text: Pompei is an Italian city in Campania. About 25,000 people live there. It is known for the ancient Roman ruins of Pompeii which are part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site. == Twin towns == Pompei is twinned with: * Gyeongju, South Korea * Latiano, Italy * Noto, Italy * Tarragona, Spain * Xi'an, China Category:Cities in the Metropolitan City of Naples
title: Pompei
